1061210.name: Trucker's Dynasty - Cuba Libre
1061210.description:
"Trucker Dynasty: Cuba Libre" offers a completely new gaming experience: a real life-, truck and business simulation in a fascinating world with a unique storyline and many possibilities.

Cuba - sun, music, dance, rum, cigars and not to forget the many beautiful beaches that invite you to stay. Uncertain political and economical conditions lead to privations in everyday life.

In post-revolutionary Cuba in the 1970s you take over a small transport company. From now on write your own story and the story of your Dynasty in "TRUCKERS DYNASTY - CUBA LIBRE".
1061210.supported_languages:
英语*, 法语*, 意大利语, 德语*, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 波兰语, 俄语
*具有完全音频支持的语言
